description: Max Zlotskiy is a student at Hunter College studying film and computer science. He founded The Icarus in his junior year.

Sajarin is a computer science major at Hunter College. His interests are primarily in ML, NLP and entrepreneurship. He is also interested in applying theory in unorthodox ways to solve big problems. He loves reading and playing table-top games.
Shakil is a senior at Hunter College. He likes learning about random developer tools that he may or may not ever use.
Emily is a junior majoring in computer science. Her strengths are in front-end development and UI/UX.

Rachel Zhang is a student journalist at CUNY Hunter College, studying Chinese and English. She is Local Editor at The Envoy, Hunter's student-run newspaper, and Assistant Editor at The Icarus, Hunter's computer-science publication. She is a Chinese Flagship Scholar, Mellon Public Humanities Scholar and Macaulay Honors Scholar.
Hammad Siddiqui is a student double majoring in Computer Science and Arabic with a minor in Math at Macaulay Honors College at Hunter College.
